org.jacp.api.coordinator
Interface ICoordinator<L,A,M>

Type Parameters:
L - defines the action listener type
A - defines the basic action type
M - defines the basic message type
All Known Subinterfaces:
IComponentCoordinator<L,A,M>, IPerspectiveCoordinator<L,A,M>
public interface ICoordinator<L,A,M>

Defines a basic observer for component messages; handles the message and delegate to responsible component.

Author:
Andy Moncsek
